name: Ente Photos
description: Open source, end-to-end encrypted alternative to Google Photos
short_desc: Privacy-focused photo storage with end-to-end encryption
author: Ente

form_fields.label: Admin Email
form_fields.hint: Email address for the admin account

form_fields.label: Admin Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the admin account (minimum 8 characters)

form_fields.label: JWT Secret
form_fields.hint: JWT secret key (leave empty to auto-generate)

form_fields.label: Enable Registration
form_fields.hint: Allow new users to register accounts
